ul.li: Deal 1 irreducible melee damage to a target.
One player may search their trash for an Equipment card and put it in their hand.

card.name: Original Halberd
card.text: When activated, Armsmaster deals 2 melee damage to a target. Then activate the primary text of the module on the left of this Halberd, and the secondary text of the module on the right of this Halberd

quote.text: His trademark and weapon was his Halberd, which was basically a spear with an axe head on the end, souped up with gadgets and the kind of technology you generally only saw in science fiction

card.name: Survey Halberd
card.text: When activated, draw a card. Then activate the primary text of the module on the left of this Halberd, and the secondary text of the module on the right of this Halberd

quote.text: "Let’s see… to deal with my buddy Grue, you’ve made that thing a fancy tuning stick. Sensing vibrations in the air, translating them into images with that fancy helm of yours?"

card.name: Experimental Halberd
card.text: When activated, Armsmaster deals 1 irreducible energy damage to a target. Then activate the primary text of the module on the left of this Halberd, and the secondary text of the module on the right of this Halberd

quote.text: ...a dull stainless steel from tip to butt end, with no decoration or style to it. The head was surrounded by a strange blur that seemed static, unmoving around the blade and point

card.name: Grapple Halberd
card.text: When activated, destroy an environment card. Then activate the primary text of the module on the left of this Halberd, and the secondary text of the module on the right of this Halberd

quote.text: It looked as though he flew up onto the roof, but the six-foot long weapon the man held kind of jerked as he landed. I was pretty sure I saw the tines of a grappling hook retreating back into the end of the weapon.

card.name: Return in a Flash
card.text: Reveal cards from the top of your deck or your trash until you reveal a Halberd. Either put it into play or into your hand. If you searched your deck, shuffle the other revealed cards back into your deck

quote.text: As if to demonstrate, he threw his Halberd straight up in the air. It disappeared into a storm of glowing blue lines as it reached the peak of its ascent, simultaneously rematerializing in his hand.

card.name: Equipment Stash
card.text: Search your deck for an Equipment card and either put it into play or into your hand. Shuffle your deck

quote.text: She stepped into the room. It fell somewhere between a workshop and an office. Two spare suits stood at one side of the room, each with minor functional differences. A set of Halberds were placed on a rack behind Armsmaster’s desk, one shattered in pieces. One of the spaces on the rack was empty – Armsmaster had the Halberd in front of him.
I saw Armsmaster fighting toe to toe with Leviathan, a Halberd in each hand.

card.name: Quick Adjustment
card.power: Return a Module in play to your hand. Play a Module

quote.text: “Ear buds,” Tattletale sighed, “Armsmaster told him to wear ear buds, so Dauntless can’t hear anyone but him. That’s both brilliant and incredibly depressing.”

card.name: Flamethrower
card.text:
Play this card next to a Halberd, either on its left or right, but only if there isn't already a card on that side.
Primary: Deal 2 fire damage to a non-hero target.
Secondary: Destroy an environment card

quote.text: The system used light for its circuits, rather than electricity, and it generated a lot of heat as a byproduct

card.name: Combat Prediction Array
card.text:
Play this card next to a Halberd, either on its left or right, but only if there isn't already a card on that side.
Primary: Reveal the top 3 cards of the villain deck, and put them back in any order.
Secondary: Until the start of your next turn, reduce damage dealt to Armsmaster by villain cards by 1

quote.text: "I’ve got a computer on my back that’s relaying to a supernetwork, noting your every move, using subsonic pulses to read every aspect of the street, the surrounding buildings, every feature of the terrain. I know exactly what you’re going to do next – you’re going to try to catch me from behind with a wave."

card.name: Recycler
card.text:
Play this card next to a Halberd, either on its left or right, but only if there isn't already a card on that side.
Primary: Draw a card.
Secondary: Activate the secondary text of the card to the left of the Halberd this card is next to

quote.text: Efficiency, detail and effective use of waste were critical aspects of his particular brand of tinkering

card.name: Medicator
card.text:
Play this card next to a Halberd, either on its left or right, but only if there isn't already a card on that side.
Primary: All hero targets regain 1 HP.
Secondary: Armsmaster regains 2 HP

quote.text: “I didn’t dose him with enough venom to kill him. What I think is that the tranquilizers that you pumped into his system knocked out his ability to heal, which is what let the poisons do as much damage as they did.”

card.name: Grappling Hook
card.text:
Play this card next to a Halberd, either on its left or right, but only if there isn't already a card on that side.
Primary: Deal 1 projectile damage to up to 2 non-hero targets.
Secondary: Destroy an Ongoing card

quote.text: The ball came flying out of the end of his weapon, but my attempt to dodge did little good. He whipped the chain to shift the sphere’s trajectory, and simultaneously opened it into its oversized grappling hook form.

card.name: Accelerator
card.text:
Play this card next to a Halberd, either on its left or right, but only if there isn't already a card on that side.
Primary: All heroes may draw a card.
Secondary: A hero other than Armsmaster may play a card

quote.text: “Let’s see how quickly you respond to classical conditioning. Every time you try to run, I’ll do something like that.”

card.name: Stasis Effector
card.text:
Play this card next to a Halberd, either on its left or right, but only if there isn't already a card on that side.
Primary: Discard 2 cards. If you do, the next time a villain card would be played, put it in the villain trash instead, and until the start of your next turn all villain character cards are immune to damage
Secondary: Destroy a target with 4 HP or less

quote.text: “For the record, that last trick was a temporal stasis trigger, with thanks owed to the cooperation of a subordinate of mine. Drains my battery reserves, but you don’t understand that, do you?”

card.name: Targeting Computer
card.text:
Play this card next to a Halberd, either on its left or right, but only if there isn't already a card on that side.
Primary: Select a hero target. The next time that hero target deals damage, increase the damage by 1 and make the damage irreducible.
Secondary: Choose a target. At the start of your next turn, you deal that target 4 projectile damage

quote.text: The lens of his right eye clicked through multiple frequencies and resolutions, until the scene stood out in high detail. The blood shone ultraviolet, and even particles of dust were highlighted.

card.name: Static Field Generator
card.text:
Play this card next to a Halberd, either on its left or right, but only if there isn't already a card on that side.
Primary: Deal 2 lightning damage to a target
Secondary: Deal 1 lightning damage to all targets with 2 or less HP

quote.text: He slammed his spear against the ground. The entire cafeteria flinched at the crackle of electricity that ripped through the air around him, flowing along exposed pipe and the heating ducts in a path to the door. Every bug in the hallway died.

card.name: Communicator
card.text:
Play this card next to a Halberd, either on its left or right, but only if there isn't already a card on that side.
Primary: A hero other than Armsmaster may use a power
Secondary: A hero other than Armsmaster may play a card

quote.text: They could communicate without talking. Some kind of system built into their masks. It made this harder. I couldn’t listen in and anticipate what they were saying.
